the user clicks on the Change Tax Credit button
the user sees the Change Tax Credit Form

elements.name: Eligible IVL Family can Modify APTC

steps.name: the tax household has at least one member that is APTC eligible
consumer clicks on the make changes button
consumer should see the make changes page
the Change Tax Credit button should be available
the user clicks on the Change Tax Credit button
the user sees the Change Tax Credit Form
the user confirms "Yes" to change the tax credit
the user changes Tax credit applied to 50%
the user submits the Change Tax Credit form
the user should see a message that their Tax Credits were updated
current user visits the family home page
consumer clicks on the make changes button
the user clicks on the Change Tax Credit button
the user should see that applied tax credit has been set accordingly

elements.name: when user purchase plan for self & having ineligible family member

steps.name: a matched Employee exists with consumer role
first ER not offers dental benefits to spouse
Employee sign in to portal
user has a dependent in spouse relationship with age less than 26
user has a dependent in child relationship with age less than 26
user did not apply coverage for child as ivl
employee clicked on shop for plans
employee should see all the family members names
employee should see the dental radio button
employee should not see the reason for ineligibility
employee switched to dental benefits
employee should see the ineligible family member disabled and unchecked
employee should see the eligible family member enabled and checked
employee should also see the reason for ineligibility
employee switched for individual benefits
employee should see the dental radio button
user should see the ivl error message
employee switched for employer-sponsored benefits
employee should not see the reason for ineligibility
employee unchecks the dependent
employee clicked on continue for plan shopping
employee should see primary and valid dependent

elements.name: User should not see IVL "Make Changes" button for SHOP enrollments

steps.name: a matched Employee exists with consumer role
user has a dependent in child relationship with age less than 26
user has a dependent in spouse relationship with age greater than 26
user did not apply coverage for child as ivl
employee also has a health enrollment with primary covered under first employer
Employee sign in to portal
employee shouldnt see make changes button in individual market
employee should see make changes button in shop market

elements.name: when IVL purchase plan for self & dependent

steps.name: a consumer exists
the consumer is logged in
consumer has a dependent in child relationship with age less than 26
consumer has successful ridp
consumer visits home page
consumer clicked on "Married" qle
I select a past qle date
I should see confirmation and continue
ivl clicked continue on household info page
consumer should see all the family members names
consumer clicked on shop for new plan
consumer should see both dependent and primary

consumer unchecks the primary person
consumer clicked on shop for new plan
consumer should only see the dependent name
